page.title: 09FOOD IN GILLINGHAM
page.content: A survey in Gillingham showed which foods people ate.{Breakfast_ cereals,toast,eggs,jam,fruit juice.{ {Lunch}_beef, sausage, cheese, sandwiches, salads.{Dinner}fish, chips, lamb chops, pork, potatoes, vegetables.{DRINKS}tea, coffee, milk, squash.We looked at the {Phoenix Pub} in the High street.Meals were easy to prepare and inexpensive e.g. sandwiches, toasted cheese and ham, Dorset Brunch(chips, pork, sausage, eggs, peas) and coffee.We visited a hotel called {Milton Lodge.}Prices were higher.Here are some examples - fruit juices, smoked mackerel salad, Avacado Pear,Tomato soup. Main course was Salmon with Parsley Sauce or Pigeon in Red Wine or Turkey with Ham and vegetables, followed by cold sweets dairy ices and coffee.Price_ Â£8.50.
